faq.title: About S7abt Cloud
faq.subtitle: Learn more about our mission and vision.
faq.a1: S7abt Cloud is a Saudi website specialized in cloud services. Through it, we try to enrich the Arabic content in the field of cloud services.
faq.q2: The Need for a Specialized Site
faq.a2: After a group of colleagues decided to enter the field of cloud services and obtain specialized certificates in it, we started the research process and the most important point was: which certificates are most suitable? Should we specialize in Amazon, Azure from Microsoft, or Google Cloud? Of course, sources in English were many and rich. But the most important point remains: what is required in the Saudi market? What is the actual need for cloud specialization in the Saudi market? No matter how abundant and rich the specialized content in English is, there is no substitute for specialized Saudi content that is linked to the Saudi market, the need in it, and the size of cloud services in the Saudi market. Therefore, we decided that after we pass the exam and obtain specialized certificates in the cloud, we will share the information we collected through this site and provide more information that helps us in permanent research and continuous updating and enriching Arabic content.
faq.a3: If you are interested in the field of cloud services or specialize in it and would like to join us, we are honored to have you. Please contact us. We are currently working on forming a working group for cloud services specialists so that we can share information and keep abreast of the most important developments in this field.
